summary: An Ordinance providing for the manner of advertising and receiving bids for bonds of The City of Seattle in the sum of $500,000.00 voted at election held in said City March 5th, 1912, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 28753; and in the sum of $125,000.00 voted at election held in said City March 5th, 1912, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 28799.
